casebody.data:
ACKERMAN v. UNITED STATES. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. April 16, 1919.) No. 194. In Error to the District Court of the United States for the Eastern District of New York. Criminal prosecution by the United States against Jacob Ackerman for illegal sale of liquor to a soldier. Judgment of conviction, and defendant brings error. Affirmed. R. F. Adams, of Long Island City, N. Y., for plaintiff in error. Melville J. Franco, U. S. Atty., of New York City.

Before WARD, ROGERS, and HOUGH, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed.
